home.role: Full Stack Developer, UI/UX Designer & Digital Communicator
home.description: I blend technology, design and communication to build digital experiences that stand out. My work goes beyond just code — I focus on the impact, the story, and how to make a product feel truly unique. I’ve helped startups, agencies and brands craft meaningful results with strong identities.

about.title: About me
about.intro: I'm Fran — a hybrid between web development, design and strategic content.
about.body: I work as a full stack developer with modern tools like React, Next.js, Node.js and Firebase. With a background in graphic design and journalism, I bring a holistic approach to building digital products. I care about usability, storytelling, scalability and creating tools people actually enjoy using. Based in Copenhagen, I'm open to remote or hybrid work where I can contribute creatively and technically.

chronocademy.name: Chronocademy
chronocademy.description: Led the development of an educational platform using React and Next.js, with Firebase integration and business logic in Node.js. I also designed marketing campaigns, content automation and branding to drive user acquisition from zero.

malambo.name: Malambo
malambo.description: Created a complete visual identity for this fashion brand: logo, palette, photo style and graphic line. Built a digital presence with strong SEO, curated content and purpose-driven social media.

worthmore.name: Worthmore
worthmore.description: Worked with this impact-driven startup improving performance and building accessible interfaces with React and SASS. Collaborated closely with marketing to align design, accessibility and conversion strategies.

web.title: Full Stack Web Development
web.description: I build fast, scalable and mobile-friendly websites and apps using React, Next.js, Node.js and Firebase. Everything is optimized and tailored to your business goals.

design.title: UI/UX Design & Prototyping
design.description: User-friendly and elegant interfaces designed in Figma. Focused on usability, aesthetics and creating joyful experiences for your users.

branding.title: Branding & Visual Identity
branding.description: Bold and consistent branding that tells your story. From logos and brand guides to visuals that reflect your values across every channel.

marketing.title: Digital Marketing & Content
marketing.description: Content plans, newsletters, social campaigns and SEO designed to connect with your audience and grow your brand with meaning.

contact.title: Let’s work together
contact.subtitle: Have a project, startup or idea?
contact.description: I'm open to freelance work, collaborations or full-time roles. Let’s talk about your vision and see how I can help you bring it to life — with creativity, code and clarity.

thankyou.title: Message sent!
thankyou.description: Thanks for reaching out! I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
